name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities (Azure HDInsight: The Sequel - Unveiling 3 New Vulnerabilities That Could Have Led to Privilege Escalations and Denial of Service)
report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka
notes: HDInsight doesn't support in-place upgrades so users must create a new cluster with the desired component and latest platform version that includes the security updates. Next, they should migrate their applications to use the new cluster.

name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities: Case #1: Azure HDInsight Apache Oozie Workflow Scheduler XXE Elevation of Privileges
report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Oozie; Hadoop
notes: vulnerability that allowed for root-level file reading and privilege escalation from low-privilege users. The vulnerability was caused through lack of proper user input validation

name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities: Case #3: Azure HDInsight Apache Oozie Regex Denial Of Service via vulnerable parameter
report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Oozie; Hadoop (Hadoop Cluster); Oozie dashboard, hosts, and jobs
notes: Due to the lack of proper input validation and constraint enforcement, an attacker can request a large range of action IDs. This causes an intensive loop operation within the system, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability
vulnerability_type: Lack of input validation and constraint enforcement

name: Three new Azure HDInshight vulnerabilities: Case #3: Azure HDInsight Apache Oozie Regex Denial Of Service via vulnerable parameter
report: Orca security: State of Cloud Security
involved_infrastructure: Azure HDInsight components: Apache Oozie; Hadoop (Hadoop Cluster); Oozie dashboard, hosts, and jobs
notes: Due to the lack of proper input validation and constraint enforcement, an attacker can request a large range of action IDs. This causes an intensive loop operation within the system, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability
vulnerability_type: Lack of input validation and constraint enforcement
T_name: Endpoint Denial of Service: Application or System Exploitation
